alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 08 at 3:49AM AKST until December 09 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow with low visibility. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. Visibility one quarter mile or less at times. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A narrow band of locally heavy snow will set up over Savoonga today with strong northerly winds and whiteout conditions. This band of heavy snow will gradually drift south on Saturday giving Savoonga a break from the worst weather. Strong north winds and temperatures in the teens may lead to freezing spray and ice accumulation at Savoonga through Saturday.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
